name: Unsleepable
description:
Story:
Mike Sorris is a 16-year-old high school student. One afternoon, after school, he was ready to go home. A female classmate in the class invited him to visit the village she lived in, but things began to be strange. Mike Sorris realized that the village had been cursed. What he had to do was to find out the truth in the village and leave the village.

Features:
Old and Classic graphics
Break the third wall
Thrilling chase
Contact with the charactors
Suspense plot
